name: my body is a temple
description:
my body is a temple. from the seat of consciousness, my soul inhabits a room of flesh, moving forwards...
-------------------------------------

Controls: arrows or wasd to move, enter to continue dialogue. Controller compatible.

all assets by Tyson Moll --- twitter: @vvvultures
soundtrack @soundcloud & included in the source files.
created with bitsy and borksy

NOTE: the game has some major slowdown issues due to bitsy's architecture. you can also try downloading the package if you prefer.
